channel.title: These children should be saved from their evil parents!

item.title: These children should be saved from their evil parents!
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

[quote=“R.I.P RSC, post:25, topic:264554”][quote author=cooper link=topic=349346.msg2688885#msg2688885 date=1235849576]

They’re just looking. Extremists equip their children with guns and make them fight.

By extremists you probably mean Muslims? But this is the same, they show guns to their children and teach them how to fire them. The same is true for boy scouts Besides, those weapons in the picture are commonly used for illegal things, as they are easier to hide.

My hate towards Jews/Jew ass fuckers (America) is growing by the day. For instance, America can go along and build all the nuclear weapons they want, but when Iran builds a plant that will help them develop America goes nuts. And why? Because a developed Iran means that Iran needs more oil, and can actually acquire the technology to refine that oil themselves. And then what happens? Less oil for America and higher prices.

I say Hail the Soviet Union Antisemitism is against party law., let’s bring it back and destroy America! [size=4pt](Not that serious)[/size]

[/quote]

  1. I was talking about destroying America, not the Jews. I have nothing against Jews, just some of their opinions.
  2. I wasn’t being that serious in the first place.[/quote]
    Neither was I

Read full topic
item.source: These children should be saved from their evil parents!

item.title: These children should be saved from their evil parents!
item.dc:creator: @MujaheD Radeon
item.description:
@MujaheD wrote:

The jews (or more accurately put, the isreali regime) ARE criminals and murderers. Israel should be responsible for any deaths that come to it’s children. That’s because they took the land illegally, and they’re using their children as human shields. If they expect to stay in a land illegally, they shouldn’t bring in any children, its not safe for children.

If hamas had the technology to direct it’s rockets, there’s no doubt they wouldn’t target children (islamically forbidden). Israel on the other hand, has killed hundreds if not thausands of children in the past, despite their advanced capabilities.

Read full topic
item.source: These children should be saved from their evil parents!

item.title: These children should be saved from their evil parents!
item.dc:creator: @PeterMan PeterMan
item.description:
@PeterMan wrote:

[quote=“MujaheD, post:20, topic:264554”][quote author=PeterMan link=topic=349346.msg2687889#msg2687889 date=1235780152]

Don’t use partial stories to incite hatred, you’re as bad as a tabloid.

I could not agree more.
I hate how the news/tabloids are always telling a story from ONE side. There are always two sides of an issue.

Thing is, Jew related news is commonly told from the Jew point of view. Palestinians are always the bad, while the Jews are the good. But it’s time to wake up; The world isn’t just black and white. (No skin color meant.)

It’s the opposite here in Norway. We only hear from the Palestinian point of view and how the Jews are the bad people.

Chances are, their parents are inciting hatred. If this particular picture isn’t of their parents doing so, it still helps create awareness. Jews do incite hatred to their children.


http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4FvXefcvXCM&feature=related

You judge :o
[/quote]

That second video had so much cut out of it… But these people aren’t teaching their kids that jews are pigs and should all be killed. Rather they’re teaching them that they have a right to this land and that it is their obligation to fight for it. Jews are taught that god regretted creating the arabs and that they’re inferior etc. They believe they have a god given right to enslave the arabs and use them.[/quote]
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TrieBhaGgHM&feature=related

Well, they called the jews criminals and murderers in this one and that they are killing innocent children. Like Hamas aren’t?

Read full topic
